zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[短期震荡，需关注支撑与阻力]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）价格为13.6279美元，24小时内小幅下降0.87%。从最近的高点和低点来看，价格在13.8722美元和13.622美元之间震荡，显示出市场的短期不确定性。整体趋势偏向于横向整理，投资者应保持警惕。

在技术指标方面，MACD值为-0.1143，虽然信号线数据缺失，但这一负值表明短期内卖压较大。考虑到RSI未提供，无法确认市场是否超卖或超买。因此，投资者应谨慎对待当前市场情绪，预防潜在的价格回调。

支撑位方面，13.622美元作为关键支撑，若价格跌破可能会引发进一步的下行压力。上方阻力位在13.8722美元，突破该位可能带来反弹机会。建议投资者密切关注这两个关键价位，以决定进出场时机。

综上所述，当前市场环境适合短线交易者，建议在支撑位附近考虑低吸，而在阻力位附近则谨慎卖出。同时，保持对市场动态的敏锐观察，以便及时调整策略。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Avalanche (AVAX) against the US Dollar is positioned at 13.6279, reflecting a slight decline of 0.87% over the past 24 hours. This minor pullback suggests a consolidation phase following recent gains. The price movement has been capped near the recent high of 13.8722, indicating that upward momentum may be stalling. Traders should monitor this level closely, as a break above could signal a renewed bullish trend, while a drop towards the low of 13.622 may confirm a bearish reversal.

In terms of technical indicators, the absence of a current RSI (Relative Strength Index) value limits the ability to gauge overbought or oversold conditions. However, the MACD is currently negative at -0.1143, suggesting that the bearish momentum may be gaining strength. This situation may prompt traders to exercise caution, as further declines could unfold if selling pressure persists. A close examination of the MACD histogram for any potential bullish crossover could provide early signals for a trend reversal.

Support and resistance levels will play a crucial role in determining the next trading direction. The immediate support level is established at 13.622, where buyers may step in to prevent further declines. Conversely, resistance is seen around 14.23584, coinciding with the 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA). A sustained move above this SMA could affirm bullish sentiment, while failure to break through may lead to a retest of support levels.

For trading strategies, a cautious approach is advisable. If the price breaks above the 20-day SMA and the resistance at 14.23584, this could present a buying opportunity with a target near 14.50. Conversely, if the price descends below 13.622, traders might consider shorting AVAX with a target around 13.50. Utilizing stop-loss orders will be essential to manage risk effectively in this fluctuating environment.
